ows:ServiceIdentification.ows:Title: ABA Atlas Services
ows:ServiceIdentification.ows:Abstract: ABA Atlas Services provide access to data available from the Allen Brain Atlas resource.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Transform POI
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Transform a POI (point of interest) from one SRS (Spatial Reference System) to another.

ows:ServiceIdentification.ows:Title: EMAP Atlas Services
ows:ServiceIdentification.ows:Abstract: EMAP Atlas Services provide access to data available from the Edinburgh Mouse Atlas Project resource.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Transform POI
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Transform a POI (point of interest) from one SRS (Spatial Reference System) to another.

ows:ServiceIdentification.ows:Title: UCSD Atlas Services
ows:ServiceIdentification.ows:Abstract: UCSD Atlas Services provide access to data available from the University of California, San Diego, Cell Centered Database (CCDB) resource.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Transform POI
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Transform a POI (point of interest) from one SRS (Spatial Reference System) to another.

ows:ServiceIdentification.ows:Title: WHS Atlas Services
ows:ServiceIdentification.ows:Abstract: WHS Atlas Services provide access to data available from the INCF Waxholm Space resource.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Transform POI
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Transform a POI (point of interest) from one SRS (Spatial Reference System) to another.
